gpt_critique.critique: Model B's link to SDG 4 aligns with explicit course content; other SDGs lack explicit ties.

gemini_critique.critique: Model B's analysis was overly strict, but prompted a re-evaluation of some indirect inferences. My original scores for Quality Education, Decent Work, Industry/Innovation, and Peace/Justice remain valid.
